languages.text: "С тех пор, как Идиры не стало, я вижу, как угасают цвета на палубах. Меньше оттенков, от которых болят глаза... Но и больше серого безразличия".
"Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."
languages.original_text: "С тех пор, как Идиры не стало, я вижу, как угасают цвета на палубах. Меньше оттенков, от которых болят глаза... Но и больше серого безразличия".

traits.locale_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “自从伊迪拉离开之后，甲板上的颜色变得黯淡下来。不再会有那么多强烈的色彩刺痛我的双眼……但同时，更多代表冷漠的灰色出现了。”
languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: “自从伊迪拉离开之后，甲板上的颜色变得黯淡下来。不再会有那么多强烈的色彩刺痛我的双眼……但同时，更多代表冷漠的灰色出现了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis qu'Idira n'est plus là, les couleurs sur le pont sont plus ternes. Au moins, ça ne me fait plus mal aux yeux, mais... je vois aussi beaucoup le gris de l'indifférence. »
languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis qu'Idira n'est plus là, les couleurs sur le pont sont plus ternes. Au moins, ça ne me fait plus mal aux yeux, mais... je vois aussi beaucoup le gris de l'indifférence. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Desde que Idira no está, los colores de las cubiertas son menos vivos. Hay menos tonos de los que hacen que me duelan los ojos... pero también más gris de indiferencia».
languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: «Desde que Idira no está, los colores de las cubiertas son menos vivos. Hay menos tonos de los que hacen que me duelan los ojos... pero también más gris de indiferencia».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「イディラがいなくなってからというもの、デッキから色が消えつつあります。私の目を傷つける影は少なくなりました…ですが、灰色の無関心も増えているのです」
languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラがいなくなってからというもの、デッキから色が消えつつあります。私の目を傷つける影は少なくなりました…ですが、灰色の無関心も増えているのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seit Idira fort ist, verblassen die Farben an Deck. Es gibt weniger Schattierungen, die meine Augen schmerzen ... Aber auch mehr graue Gleichgültigkeit."
languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: "Seit Idira fort ist, verblassen die Farben an Deck. Es gibt weniger Schattierungen, die meine Augen schmerzen ... Aber auch mehr graue Gleichgültigkeit."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

languages.text: "İdira'nın ölümünden bu yana güvertedeki renklerin solduğunu fark ettim. Gözlerimi acıtan tonların sayısı azaldı... Kayıtsızlık grileri ise arttı."
languages.original_text: "Since Idira's been gone, I have seen the colours on the decks fade. There are fewer shades that make my eyes hurt... But more grey indifference, too."

traits.locale_text: "İdira'nın ölümünden bu yana güvertedeki renklerin solduğunu fark ettim. Gözlerimi acıtan tonların sayısı azaldı... Kayıtsızlık grileri ise arttı."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
